https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xfjONUpoEakb14m0dRK3Xqc69Xy.jpg A look at the evolution of Albert Einstein's theory of relativity, and Einstein's relationship with British scientist Sir Arthur Eddington, the first physicist to understand his ideas. Einstein and Eddington
